Azureblade was unimpressed. Clearly, they were strong, but not so much
as P=
redaking had been. He would dispose of them quick enough.

Azureblade: Drag=
ons, huh? More than one can play this game...

He planted his sword in the =
ground than backed off a little before his
thousands of pieces moved to for=
m something else. His mechanical tail
was long and seemed like a heavy flai=
l, his wings seemed to have been
made to shred things up, and he seemed to =
look like a standing
skeleton the way his armor covered him. His neck was e=
xtended, but not
so much as theirs. His horns started drilling and he opene=
d his jaws
for a massive roar... followed by an equally massive blast of en=
ergy
aimed at the leftmost enemy. Without waiting, he took the sword out of=

the Moon's rocky soil and brandished it menacingly.

AzureBlade: You amuse=
 me Minions. You show yourselves as tough, but
are really nothing like the =
real deal. You won't amuse me for long.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Sup=
er Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> 
> 
> > ???: MINIONS! I HAVE COM=
E TO BRING YOU DEATH! I AM THE REAPER THAT
> > WILL REMOVE YOUR STAIN ON TH=
E UNIVERSE! FEAR ME, FOR I AM AZUREBLADE!
> > 
> > There. The challenge was=
 issued. He readied his pulse cannon, his
> > missile launcher and his swor=
d. This would be a day they'd wish had
> > never come!
> 
> From the distan=
ce three shadows seem to almost materialize in the
> distance as cold laugh=
ter echoes back at Azureblade. "You do not belong
> here Predacon." 
> 
> T=
he shadows as they approach take on distinct forms: A trio of black
> shape=
s looking like both beast and machine with large outswept wings as
> if to =
catch an air that all knows doesn't exist here on the moon. Long
> serpenti=
ne necks end in large and elongated reptillian heads with jaws
> filled wit=
h rows of teeth. Optics blaze as boosters mounted on thier
> backs flare. L=
ong whiplike tails complete the picture, swishing behind
> them as they agi=
liy push through the faint atmosphere of the moon.
> 
> "And the only thing=
 you will reap here is your own DEATH!"
> 
> They continue to approach, as =
what could only be cannons glow and rip
> into the area Azureblade stands!
